mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_table(commentWriter, commentContents, boardId, createdAt) VALUES(#{commentWriter}, #{commentContents}, #{boardId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, commentWriter, commentContents, boardId, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt FROM comment_table WHERE boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, commentWriter, commentContents, boardId, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt FROM comment_table WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.commentWriter, c.commentContents, c.boardId, DATE_FORMAT(c.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdAt, r.id as reply_id, r.replyWriter, r.replyContents, r.commentId as reply_commentId, DATE_FORMAT(r.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reply_createdAt FROM comment_table c LEFT JOIN reply_table r ON c.id = r.commentId WHERE c.boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY c.id DESC, r.id ASC
